CustomField.formula: IF( OR(TEXT(codeProduit__r.Family) = "Persienne",TEXT(codeProduit__r.Family) = "PORTAILS",TEXT(codeProduit__r.Family) = "Volet Battant",TEXT(codeProduit__r.Family) = "Volet Roulant"), CASE(codeGarantie__r.code__c,"ETANCH",1,"TENUE",2,"MOTOR",3,"MECA",4,"POIGNEE",5,"SERR",6,"TEINTE",7,"LAQU",8,"PLAX",9,"LASURE",9,"POSE",10,0), IF( TEXT(codeProduit__r.Family) = "Store", CASE(codeGarantie__r.code__c,"ETANCH",1,"TENUE",2,"MOTOR",3,"TOILE",4,"MECA",5,"LAQU",6,"POSE",7,0), IF( codeProduit__r.SousFamille__c = "Porte de garage", CASE(codeGarantie__r.code__c,"ETANCH",1,"TENUE",2,"VITRAGE",3,"MOTOR",4,"MECA",5,"POIGNEE",6,"SERR",7,"LAQU",8,"POSE",9,0), CASE(codeGarantie__r.code__c,"ETANCH",1,"TENUE",2,"VITRAGE",3,"MECA",4,"POIGNEE",5,"SERR",6,"TEINTE",7,"LAQU",8,"PLAX",9,"LASURE",9,"POSE",10,0))))
